ui.desc: The most sensible way to read your inner self

guide.purpose: This test measures the 'Dark Triad' of personality traits to analyze your hidden social strategies and instincts.
guide.instruction: Please read each statement and select the option that best describes you. Honest answers lead to more accurate profiling.
guide.interpretation: The results consist of Narcissism, Machiavellianism, and Psychopathy. These reflect your survival strategies rather than moral judgment.

items.text: I feel that I am a special person and deserve better treatment than others.
I can skillfully persuade or manipulate people to achieve my goals.
I do not feel significant emotional distress when I see the misfortune of others.
I thoroughly enjoy situations where I receive attention and praise.
I tend to keep important information to myself and use it at an advantageous moment.
I feel a thrill rather than fear when doing risky or stimulating things.
I consider myself an ordinary person and try to act with humility.
Deceiving someone for personal gain is morally unacceptable to me.

N.high: High self-confidence and strong leadership, but may be conscious of others' opinions.
N.low: Humble, cooperative, and values the interests of the community.

M.high: Strategic and goal-oriented achiever with quick situational judgment.
M.low: Values honest, transparent communication and adheres to principles.

P.high: Maintains composure in crises and demonstrates bold decision-making.
P.low: High empathy and deeply considerate of others' feelings.
